description: Reads a directory of Kubernetes configuration recursively.
Writes a directory of Kubernetes configuration. It maintains the original directory structure as read by source functions.
Enforces OPA constraints on input objects. The constraints are also passed as part of the input to the function.
[Demo] Mutates PodSecurityPolicy objects by setting spec.allowPrivilegeEscalation to false.
[Demo] Enforces a blacklist of subjects in RoleBinding objects.
[Demo] Reads custom resources of type Team and generates multiple Namespace and RoleBinding objects.
